channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 黑人历史月被认为是美国历史最悠久的有组织历史庆祝活动之一，几十年来，美国总统一直通过公告和庆祝活动来认可这一活动。
item.description:
Black History Month is considered one of the nation’s oldest organized history celebrations, and has been recognized by U.S. presidents for decades through proclamations and celebrations.

Here are four things to know about its origins. pic.twitter.com/yXAhG3O7au

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）是历史上任职时间最长的参议院领袖，他在共和党近 20 年的剧烈动荡中始终保持着自己的权力，他将于 11 月卸任参议院领袖一职。
item.description:
Mitch McConnell, the longest-serving Senate leader in history who maintained his power in the face of dramatic convulsions in the Republican Party for almost two decades, will step down from that position in November. pic.twitter.com/pVvcvPTmzZ

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: Cierra Ramirez 在《The Fosters》中度过了五年，又在《Good Trouble》中度过了五年，随着该剧的结束，她对未来的项目也有了自己的目标。
item.description:
After spending five years on "The Fosters," and an additional five years on "Good Trouble," Cierra Ramirez has goals for future projects as the show comes to an end. pic.twitter.com/BFXBVP2M2R

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 28, 2024

item.title: 娱乐公司 Kugali 的创意人员开玩笑说，他们的企业要 "踢迪斯尼的屁股"，但 Kugali 却加入了迪斯尼，并合作制作了这家媒体巨头的首部非洲系列剧《Iwájú》。Kugali 的目标是讲述受非洲文化启发的故事。
item.description:
Entertainment company creatives at Kugali joked that their business was going to "kick Disney's a--," but instead Kugali joined Disney and collaborated on the media giant's first African series, "Iwájú."

Kugali's goal is to tell stories inspired by African culture. pic.twitter.com/KwdMhZtghr

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 28, 2024
